spring.controller

Class RESTUserMeController

  • java.lang.Object
    • spring.controller.RESTUserMeController

  • @RestController
 @RequestMapping(value="/${path.users}/me")
public class RESTUserMeController
extends java.lang.Object
    Requests that are implemented in this class: 1) GET /users/me 2) PUT /users/me 3) GET /users/me/functions 4) GET /users/me/functions/{id} these requests to not require a "Function" header and only need an "Authorization" header
